notes: Provides 1600 radius ground vision at its location.
Cannot be placed inside the fountain area (including a small area in front of the ramp), or in Roshan's pit.
It is not possible to give couriers or Spirit Bear an Observer Ward by holding Control.
Observer Wards can be targeted by enemy Tango, Quelling Blade, Battle Fury, and Iron Talon to be instantly destroyed.
Creep spawn ranges are shown before placing a ward, allowing camps to be blocked.
The radiuses of already placed Observer Wards is shown as well, allowing to see how they overlap.

While having the ward selected, multiple indicators appear on the world and minimap. The targeting courser depicts the ward, with a green circle around it. The circle shows its vision range. The minimap shows a yellow area, depecting how much the ward would reveal when placed at that point. The yellow markings consider trees and terrain height around the area.
The Ward's gold bounty increases by 1 every 15 seconds, and the experience by 1 every 10 seconds.
Illusions and creep-heroes are treated as creeps when attacking the ward, so they take 8 attacks to destroy it, instead of 2 like heroes.
abilities.description: Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes. Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

notes: The ability and modifier are not displayed in-game.

tips: Essential to victory, Observer Wards allow you to keep watch over areas and spy on your enemies while keeping you and other heroes safe. It is important to keep wards up in key locations, and destroy enemy wards.
Observer Wards are considered essential to map control, providing vision for runes, watching out for ganks, and blocking neutral creeps from spawning in the jungle.
Although it is common for the support to purchase wards, mid and offlaners can purchase them to set up ganks or block the enemy team's safe lane jungle camp respectively.
info: Stacks with itself and with Sentry Wards in the inventory, there is no stack limit. The sell value adapts based on the number of instances in a stack. Wards from multiple players are combined when given by allies.
Observer Wards do not provide True Sight.
Killing an Observer Ward prints out a chat notification to allies.
The Observer Ward's gold bounty is granted to whoever bought the source of True Sight the ward was affected by as it got destroyed.
